about_the_game:
A new force of women are at your command to liberate the galaxy from large and mysterious threats. Join the GIRLDIVERS, humanity's last line of offense against the alien menace threatening to plunge the galaxy into tyranny.



Liberate The Galaxy
Explore a well-crafted campaign with randomly generated challenges. Unweave a rich storyline as you develop your relationships with the sexy girls in your squad. Fight your way to the occupied strongholds of an alien infestation, the likes of which humanity has never seen.

Our unique progression system faces you with scaling difficulty while you encounter newer and greater threats to democracy.


Unlock Powerful New Items
Take advantage of an extensive collection of weapons and gadgets to adapt against the challenges of wild missions.

An adaptable loadout allows you to equip your team with the best counters available in the Super Earth arsenal. Big or small, the hordes of bugs stand no chance against humanity's firepower. Use air support for bombing runs or to call in specialty weapons.



Enchanting Pixel Art
From your spaceship, to each character, you will find loving & expertly drawn art. Sex animations, Story shots, Planet details, Weapons, Gear, Enemies. All made with loving intent & passion.



  • Beautifully drawn adult content.
  • Challenging action gameplay.
  • Procedurally generated planetary missions.
  • A rich campaign of liberation with a galaxy full of unique content.
  • High quality soundtrack.
  • Personal progression through new weapons & gadgets.
  • Many beautiful planet types all with unique styles and difficulties.
  • Lots of lewd story shots as you progress through the campaign.
  • Bonus sex animation scenes.

Safe For Work Mode
Came for the lewd, stayed for the gameplay? Streaming? We have you covered. In the tutorial, and any time in the settings, you can turn on Safe For Work mode. The game is full of sexy characters with tight clothes & maybe just a tiny bit of pixel blood... But this mode will get rid of explicit nudity, and censor story event shots and dialogue.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Some Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence or Gore, Adult Only Sexual Content, Frequent Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content. All characters depicted are 18+.

name: GIRLDIVERS
short_description: Join the GIRLDIVERS, humanity's last line of offense against an overwhelming alien menace. Command sexy girl soldiers in a rich campaign full of randomly generated challenges, unforgiving enemies, sci-fi gadgets, and heavy firepower. Engaging in lewd punishments and rewards along the way.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil
